comment: He's a good teacher to have if he likes you. His papers are very specific, even though he doesn't give rubrics. It's an easy class if you show up and do all the work. He's a funny guy, challenges you to think abstractly but at the end of the day, his opinion will dictate discussions
He is not helpful at all. Very tough grader. Very boring in class and can't keep the attention of his students.
Kind of a jerk. Okay teacher, but by no means great. Tells you not to "kiss the dummy" but grades you poorly if you don't. Basically, agree with everything he ever says and you'll do fine.
He is very understanding about personal issues. All you need to do is rewriting your paper until you are satisfy with your grade. I got an easy A

He is a very entertaining teacher. He uses a lot of funny videos to help teach. Fall 2011 was his first semester here but he was at SCAD before. I really liked him and as long as you keep trying on the papers, you will get a good grade :)
